external.collector: var tabletojson = require('tabletojson'); function getDate(dateString) { return new Date('20' + dateString.substring(6,8), dateString.substring(3,5) - 1, dateString.substring(0,2), dateString.substring(9,11), dateString.substring(12));} if (external.response.statusCode === 200) { var tables = tabletojson.convert(external.response.body); var result = []; for (var ii = 1; ii < tables[2].length - 1; ii++) { var entry = [{'name': 'address', 'type': 'Address', 'value': {'addressCountry': 'ES', 'addressLocality': tables[1][1][1], 'streetAddress': tables[1][3][1]}}, {'name': 'dateObserved', 'type': 'DateTime', 'value': getDate(tables[2][ii][0]).toISOString()}, {'name': 'S02', 'type': 'Number', 'value': tables[2][ii][1]}, {'name': 'PM10', 'type': 'Number', 'value': tables[2][ii][2]}, {'name': 'NO2', 'type': 'Number', 'value': tables[2][ii][3]}, {'name': 'CO2', 'type': 'Number', 'value': tables[2][ii][4]}, {'name': 'O3', 'type': 'Number', 'value': tables[2][ii][5]}, {'name': 'measurand', 'type': 'List', 'value': ['SO2,' + tables[2][ii][1] + ',GQ,Sulfur Dioxide', 'PM10,' + tables[2][ii][2] + ',GQ,Suspended Particles', 'NO2,' + tables[2][ii][3] + ',GQ,Nitrogen Dioxide', 'CO2,' + tables[2][ii][4] + ',GQ,Carbon Monoxide', 'O3,' + tables[2][ii][5] + ',GQ,Ozone']}]; result.push(entry); } module.exports = result; }
